Solver Settings ---------------
Equations
Equation Solved ------------------- Flow yes Turbulence yes Energy yes P1 yes

Linear Solver
Variable Solver Type Termination Criterion Residual Reduction Tolerance ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Pressure V-Cycle 0.1 X-Momentum Flexible 0.1 0.7 Y-Momentum Flexible 0.1 0.7 Z-Momentum Flexible 0.1 0.7 Turbulent Kinetic Energy Flexible 0.1 0.7 Turbulent Dissipation Rate Flexible 0.1 0.7 Energy F-Cycle 0.1 P1 Flexible 0.1 0.7
Pressure-Velocity Coupling
Parameter Value ----------------------------- Type SIMPLEC Skewness Correction 0
Discretization Scheme
Variable Scheme ------------------------------------------------ Pressure PRESTO! Momentum Second Order Upwind Turbulent Kinetic Energy First Order Upwind Turbulent Dissipation Rate First Order Upwind Energy Second Order Upwind
Solution Limits
Quantity Limit --------------------------------------- Minimum Absolute Pressure 1 Maximum Absolute Pressure 5e+10 Minimum Temperature 1 Maximum Temperature 5000 Minimum Turb. Kinetic Energy 1e-14 Minimum Turb. Dissipation Rate 1e-20 Maximum Turb. Viscosity Ratio 100000
